article_title: Idaho legislative leaders: Medicaid expansion still in talks

article_metadata.title: Idaho legislative leaders: Medicaid expansion still in talks | Idaho Statesman

og.description: Idaho House and Senate leaders said their fellow lawmakers are still looking at options to help Idaho’s poor and uninsured get health care subsidies, with a modified plan to accept federal Medicaid dollars still be on the table.
og.title: Idaho legislative leaders: Medicaid expansion still in talks
